channel.title: Is Codex dead?
channel.description:
Codex hasn't been published since March. We've had a bit of other content published since then, but entirely focused on BB or The Between. And even that hasn't been the volume that we'd normally expect from Codex.
If the zine is on hiatus, it would be good to know so folks can make informed decisions about Patreon membership.

item.title: Is Codex dead?
item.dc:creator: @Almanac
item.description:
@Almanac wrote:

To this point, when will back issues start getting put back up on Drive thru? The last published issue is from September of 2020.

Read full topic

item.title: Is Codex dead?
item.dc:creator: @jasoncordova
item.description:
@jasoncordova wrote:

The next issue, Codex Void 2, should be out next month.

Read full topic

item.title: Is Codex dead?
item.dc:creator: @HorstWurst
item.description:
@HorstWurst wrote:

I’ll ask on the Slack. Also paging @jasoncordova from Gauntlet Publishing.

Read full topic
